Source   Edit  

This module implements binary fields with XMM register.

Imports

../../arrayutils, ../../assign, ../../bitops, ../../expand, ../../simd, ../../staticfor, ../../../core/behaviour, ../../../core/common

Types

BinaryField = M128i
Binary field with XMM register. Source   Edit

func areSettledTsu(field0, field1, field2, existField: BinaryField): bool {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns true if all binary fields are settled by Tsu physics. Note that this function is only slightly lighter than settleTsu. Source   Edit   
func areSettledWater(field0, field1, field2, existField: BinaryField): bool {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns true if all binary fields are settled by Tsu physics. Note that this function is only slightly lighter than settleWater. Source   Edit   
func crossRotate(self: var BinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Rotates the binary field by 180 degrees in groups of three rows. Ghost cells are cleared before the rotation. Source   Edit   
func del(self: var BinaryField; row: Row; col: Col; physics: Physics) {.inline,
    noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Deletes the value and shifts the binary field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the binary field downward above where deleted. If it is in the water, shifts the binary field upward below where deleted. Source   Edit   
func dropNuisanceTsu(self: var BinaryField; counts: array[Col, int];
                     existField: BinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops cells by Tsu physics. This function requires that the mask is settled and the counts are non-negative. Source   Edit

                         existField: BinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops cells by Tsu physics. This function requires that the counts are non-negative. Source   Edit   
func dropNuisanceWater(self, other1, other2: var BinaryField;
                       counts: array[Col, int]) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops cells by Water physics. other1 and other2 are only shifted. This function requires that the mask is settled and the counts are non-negative. Source   Edit

                           counts: array[Col, int]) {.inline, noinit,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

func initWaterTop(T: type BinaryField): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}

func insert(self: var BinaryField; row: Row; col: Col; val: bool;
            physics: Physics) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [],
                                forbids: [].}
Inserts the value and shifts the binary field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the binary field upward above where inserted. If it is in the water, shifts the binary field downward below where inserted. Source   Edit

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field with only the given column. Source   Edit

    BinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the masks where a next puyo is placed with Tsu physics. This function accepts an unsettled field. Source   Edit
